feed.title: NeoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.11.6.4
entry.content:
• adjust search result page
  • improve blocking to clean up notification from the blocked user etc

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.11.6.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Reworked single post page, logged in web users can now see protected and private posts.
  • Fixed cert compatibility with cloudflare sites - https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1957701
  • Added support for translating comment/review/post, via DeepL or LibreTranslate
  • Guest user can change device-based settings without login

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.11.6.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add .env option NEODB_DISCOVER_SHOW_POPULAR_TAGS , default False
  • support demetrication in preference
  • add action button to flag a post
  • various fixes

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.11.6.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • pin post/review/collection, viewable from Mastodon-compatible apps
  • pinned collections will be shown in profile
  • add option restrict editing of an item to staff only

entry.title: New release for NeoDB:
entry.content: fixed missing parameter in item post api fixed an issue when receiving remote report
